EmailTemplate.description: Email template for CMA CPA Licence renewal reminder
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Info CMA CPA Renewal Reminders Email
EmailTemplate.subject: CMA CPA renewal reminder {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning
Licence Record {!Account.Name} has the existing contract due to expire soon.
Please review this Contract agreement and complete required documents if needed.
Click here to view Licence.
Regards
